name: h3
description: The 2026 DeMarini The Goods Drop 10 USA Baseball Bat is designed for players seeking a balanced swing feel and optimal performance. Certified by USA Baseball, this bat features a two-piece hybrid construction with an X14 Alloy Barrel, offering a huge sweet spot that caters to both contact and power hitters. Its 2 5/8-inch barrel diameter is complemented by a Direct Connection system, ensuring a stiff yet comfortable feel for enhanced responsiveness. The vibrant colorway of yellow, red, and black is matched by a Tracer End Cap, which boosts bat speed for maximum barrel performance.
